      • allowLargePayload

        public void allowLargePayload(boolean allowLargePayload)
        Maximum size of data payload is limited to 80 bytes. If allowLargePayload is true, larger data is accepted by client.
        Parameters:
        allowLargePayload - boolean option to set allowLargePayload.

      • setFee

        public void setFee(long amount)
        Set transfer fee for transaction
        Parameters:
        fee - amount of fee to pay to miners (minimum 0.0001 BTC = 10000 satoshi)
        Throws:
        MalformedInputException
